name: @gsong/ccmcp
description: Claude Code MCP Selector - Intelligently discover, validate, and select MCP server configurations for Claude Code
author: George Song

scripts.publish:npm: pnpm run build && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push origin "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.publish:dry-run: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --dry-run --access public
scripts.release:patch: git status --porcelain | grep -q . && echo 'Working directory not clean' && exit 1 || (pnpm version patch && git push --follow-tags && pnpm run build && pnpm publish --access public)
scripts.release:minor: git status --porcelain | grep -q . && echo 'Working directory not clean' && exit 1 || (pnpm version minor && git push --follow-tags && pnpm run build && pnpm publish --access public)
scripts.release:major: git status --porcelain | grep -q . && echo 'Working directory not clean' && exit 1 || (pnpm version major && git push --follow-tags && pnpm run build && pnpm publish --access public)
